effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.

effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.

short_effect.sword_shield: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.
